headline.main: Lost U.S. Flier, Back at Guadalcanal Base, Finds Rival Has Gone Ahead in Plane Bag

lead_paragraph: AT SEA OFF THE SOLOMON ISLANDS, Sept. 15 (delayed) -- Twenty-six-year-old Captain Marion E. Carl of Hubbard, Ore., second-ranking marine ace on Guadalcanal, returned to his base yesterday after having been missing five days.
abstract: Capt M E Carl rejoins marines unit 5 days after being downed off Guadalcanal; finds rival ace, Maj J L Smith, has downed 15 planes to his 11
